title: Saint-loup
author: Saint-loup
content: This young lady, Keerthi, dares to claim that Indian people have an inferiority complex towards Westerners.Is it true ? And is it appropriate for a young woman to say this kind of thing? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T4PUZtbjaQg

comments.author: RajeshKarwa
comments.body: India is a diverse country with a rich cultural heritage. Like any society, it may have individuals who feel inferior or have a sense of inadequacy compared to people from other cultures or regions. However, it would be inaccurate and unfair to generalize this sentiment to the entire Indian population.Thanks !!

comments.author: LucyFurr
comments.body: It was true but I don't think its valid anymore and the reason is whites always treated people of colours below their for centuries till the late 20th century so it will take a while for the things to change completely.
